synopsis.text: Kei Takishima and Hikari Hanazono have been rivals since they were six years old, when Kei defeated Hikari in a wrestling match. Determined to one day beat Kei, Hikari enrolls in the prestigious Hakusenkan High School, where Kei is a top student. The school is divided into classes based on academic rankings, with the top seven students forming the elite Special A class. Hikari and Kei are joined in Special A by Akira Toudou, Tadashi Karino, Megumi Yamamoto, Jun Yamamoto, and Ryuu Tsuji. While Hikari sees Kei only as a rival, Kei harbors secret feelings for her. As they compete in academics and athletics, Hikari strives to finally claim victory over Kei, while Kei hopes that she will one day see him as more than just a rival. Will Hikari ever achieve her dream of defeating Kei, or will she discover that there is more to their relationship than just competition?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
